Question: In 1832, at age 23, this person and a partner bought a small general store on credit in New Salem, Illinois.
Hints: This person did not show the pledge to his cabinet, but asked them to sign the sealed envelope.
This person brought in Joseph Hooker, despite his record of loose talk about the need for a military dictatorship.
"Willie" this person was born on December 21, 1850, and died on February 20, 1862.
